# transform(using:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the specified transform to the contents of this drawing.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func transform(using transform: CGAffineTransform)
```

## Parameters

- **transform**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGAffineTransform] to apply when transforming the contents of this drawing.

## Modifying the drawing

- **transformed(using:)**: Applies the specified transform and returns a new drawing.
- **append(_:)**: Appends the contents of the specified drawing object to an existing drawing object that you provide.
- **appending(_:)**: Returns a new drawing created by appending the current drawing with another drawing you provide.
